Transcription for 1244521

Lovely wedding day. Yes. Yeah. What can you remember about it? It was held at half past one at the swinging hall.
Can you remember what you wore that day? White, nice white dress and jacket.
You were creaming, you were going so off white, my dress. That was my brother.
What's your brother called? James. James. What was James's colour? Was James the suit? Black.
